Title: Emporio Armani AR4673 Men's Automatic Meccanico Silver Tone Black Leather Watch
Description: EMPOIRIO ARMANI AR4673 MECCANICO AUTOMATIC BLACK LEATHER STRAP MEN'S DRESS WATCH New with Tags Box not included 100% Authentic Product DetaIls This is another beautifully crafted timepiece from Emporio Armani watches. The silver case of this mens designer watch AR4673 is perfectly complemented by the warm tones of the black leather strap for a modern take on a classic colour combination. The dial combines a mixture of different shades bronze and brown textured finishes. There are three additional sub-dials within the main face of this Emporio Armani watch AR4673 which show the power reserve indicator, the date function and the seconds. The back of the case has a clear glass insert which reveals the 28 jewel movement within. This watch is powered by the movement of the wearer's wrist. If not worn regularly it may lose its charge but it can easily be started again and will never need a new battery The genuine leather strap of this mens designer watch AR4673 has a genuine black leather strap. 2 years mechanical warranty Japanese Automatic INFORMATION BRANDEmporio ArmaniGENDERMen'sMOVEMENTAutomatic CASE CASE SIZE43 mmCASE THICKNESS12.90 mmCASE MATERIALStainless SteelCROWNPull / PushCASE SHAPERoundCASE BACKTransparentBEZELFixed Stainless Steel DIAL DIAL TYPEAnalogDIAL COLORBlack with Grey Cut-outCRYSTALScratch Resistant MineralHANDSSkeleton Silver-toneSECOND MARKERSEmporio Armani Logo at the 12 o'clock position.
